crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_account_id, {'id': doc._id, 'status': doc.pvt_job_status, 'to': doc.to_number, 'from': doc.from_nubmer, 'created': doc.pvt_created}); }

jobs.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_job_status != 'pending') return; emit(doc.pvt_created, null); }

processing_by_node.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.pvt_job_status != 'processing' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_job_node, {'modified' : doc.pvt_modified} ); }
